about_the_game:
Skyblocker is a cozy and competitive 3D puzzle game in which players build their tower as high and as fast as they can. It's a fun and infinitely replayable indie title with six unique levels, dynamic weather, insightful player statistics, and gorgeous unlockable cosmetics. It has both a competitive mode with an online leaderboard for high scores, as well as a cozy "Zen" mode where you can relax and build with no added pressure.

Skyblocker's advanced scoring system accounts for a broad range of factors such as your multiplier, average block placement time, and how high your tower reaches, just to name a few. Other player statistics are also recorded, such as lifetime number of blocks placed, lifetime mass of blocks placed, and the height of your highest tower. Play and compete for a high score with global online leaderboards!

There are a total of six unique playable levels, all with optional dynamic weather including wind that could blow your tower over! There are also dozens of gorgeous in-game unlockable block skins, so you can customize your blocks with your favorite look!

name: Skyblocker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8Ghz 6-core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660, RX 590, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz 8-core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 SUPER, RX 5700 XT, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A cozy and competitive 3D puzzle game in which players build their tower as high and as fast as they can, Skyblocker is a fun and infinitely replayable indie title with six unique levels, dynamic weather, online leaderboards, insightful player statistics, and gorgeous unlockable cosmetics.
